<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shadow Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2069) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 192 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetypes** [Shadowdancer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=77), [Shadowcaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=101) (Level 12)

**Prerequisites**
[Shadowdancer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2067)

</column>

---

You gain the ability to fuse and play with shadows by using focus spells specific to shadowdancers. You learn a shadowdancer focus spell of your choice: [_dance of darkness_](/Spells.aspx?ID=662) or [_shadow jump_](/Spells.aspx?ID=664). If you don't already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can [Refocus](/Actions.aspx?ID=71) by meditating within an area of dim light or darkness. The rules for focus spells appear [here](/Rules.aspx?ID=276).

Shadowdancer focus spells are occult spells. You become trained in occult spell attack rolls and spell DCs, and your spellcasting ability for these spells is Charisma.

<title level="2">Shadow Magic leads to...</title>
[Additional Shadow Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2070), [Shadow Illusion](/Feats.aspx?ID=2071), [Shadow Power](/Feats.aspx?ID=2072)
name: Shadow Magic
